mapper.update: update app_recurring_bank_wc_fa set recurring_bank_wc_fa_id = #{recurringBankWcFaId}, recurring_bank_write_check_id = #{recurringBankWriteCheckId}, account_no = #{accountNo}, department_id = #{departmentId}, amount = #{amount}, job_order_no = #{jobOrderNo} where recurring_bank_wc_fa_id = #{recurringBankWcFaId};
